title: Mohua Galactic Trust
subtitle: Explore The Galaxy Through Your Own Eyes

card1.title: About Us
card1.content: A small non-profit organization dedicated to exploring the galaxy from the comfort of our homes.

card2.title: Events
card2.content: We host a variety of events and meet ups to share our love of the galaxy with others. Check out our calendar for more information.

card3.title: Donate
card3.content: Donate to us to help fund our equipment and events. Every little bit helps!

card4.title: Contact Us
card4.content: Get in touch with us to learn more about our mission and how you can help.
